A header to put inside argonDashSidebar
#### Description
A header to put inside argonDashSidebar

#### Usage
<pre><code>

argonSidebarHeader(title = NULL)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments

* title Header title

Create a Boostrap 4 argon sidebar menu
argonSidebarItem
#### Description
Build an argon dashboard main sidebar menu

#### Usage
<pre><code>

argonSidebarItem(..., tabName = NULL, icon = NULL, icon_color = NULL)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments

... Item name.
tabName Should correspond exactly to the tabName given in argonTabItem.
icon Item icon.
icon_color Icon color.
